info.title: HybridNetworkManagementClient
info.description: The resources in this swagger specification will be used by publishers to on-board offerings and manage network functions.

get.description: Lists all the publishers in a subscription.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of publisher resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the publishers in a resource group.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of publisher resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: publisherName
parameters.description: The name of the publisher.

200.description: OK. Request is successful.

202.description: Accepted. Sets provisioningState to 'Deleting' until the operation is completed. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

204.description: Request is successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the specified publisher.

parameters.name: publisherName
parameters.description: The name of the publisher.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting publisher resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: publisherName
parameters.description: The name of the publisher.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create publisher operation.

200.description: OK. Request is successful.

201.description: Created. The header contains 'Azure-AsyncOperation' header pointing to an operations resource. The operation URI can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: publisherName
parameters.description: The name of the publisher.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create publisher operation.

200.description: OK. Request is successful.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

202.description: Accepted. Sets provisioningState to 'Deleting' until the operation is completed. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

put.description: Creates or updates a artifact store.

parameters.name: publisherName
parameters.description: The name of the publisher.

parameters.name: artifactStoreName
parameters.description: The name of the application group.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update application group operation.

200.description: Creation or update is successful. The operation returns the resulting ArtifactStore sub resource.

201.description: Created. The operation returns the resulting artifact store  resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a artifact manifest.

parameters.name: artifactStoreName
parameters.description: The name of the artifact store.

parameters.name: artifactManifestName
parameters.description: The name of the artifact manifest Name.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update artifact manifest operation.

200.description: Creation or update is successful. The operation returns the resulting ArtifactManifest sub resource.

post.description: List credentials for publishing artifacts defined in artifact manifest.

parameters.name: publisherName
parameters.description: The name of the publisher.

parameters.name: artifactStoreName
parameters.description: The name of the artifact store.

parameters.name: artifactManifestName
parameters.description: The name of the artifact manifest.

200.description: Request is successful. The operations returns the credential for publishing artifacts.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: publisherName
parameters.description: The name of the publisher.

parameters.name: artifactStoreName
parameters.description: The name of the artifact store.

parameters.name: artifactManifestName
parameters.description: The name of the artifact manifest.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update the state of artifact manifest.

200.description: Request is successful. The operations returns the credential for publishing artifacts.

201.description: Request is successful. The operations returns the credential for publishing artifacts.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
